alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 10:23AM CDT until April 25 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Cass and Ransom Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Cavalier and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. The city park in Hillsboro starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 12.9 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
